text: The flag of Etzatl치n () It is colored and the coat of arms in the center in white, was created in 2023. It has a white diagonal cross divided the field into alternating blue and yellow areas. The center of the cross merges into a white disk, on which there are eight solid six-pointed stars outlined in yellow. The ratio of the flag was 2:3 until 27 September 2023. The ratio of the flag is 3:4. ==References== Etzatl치n Etzatl치n Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Etzatl치n
